info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 01 at 7:42PM CDT until May 01 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Borden County in western Texas... Northeastern Martin County in western Texas... Northern Howard County in western Texas... Southeastern Dawson County in western Texas... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 742 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ackerly, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Ackerly, Gail, Luther, J B Thomas Reservoir, Sparenberg, Vincent, Vealmoor and Key. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for western Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for western Texas.
